title: Bug 114470 - Error message throws when using new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter.
description: When trying to use the date '3/2/2005' as a value in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
OB: When using the expression new Date("3/2/2005") as a value in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
EB: The table filter should accept the date '3/2/2005' without throwing an error message.
SR: 1. Create a datasource and a dataset containing a datetime column. 2. Insert a table and add a filter based on the datetime column. 3. In the filter settings, enter new Date("3/2/2005") as the value in value1 field.
